name: Milky Wayward
description:
A game made for the Volcano Gamejam 2019 by @yosoykini @prichi and @guimero64

Lyrics:

Crown on my head
Dreams in my bed

Why won't you play with me
Don't run away

Milky Way
Milky Wayward
Milky you are

Stars all are bound
No friends around
Please come my way

Wayward Wayward Way
Runaway

Milky Wayward

Controls:

WASD to navigate

E to grab

Esc for options

***Sounds and song made during the jam
